地域レベルの社会関係資本の研究
```{r}
source("recode_GULP.R")
```


```{r}
r_srh <- lm(SRH ~ fmd + married + edu + income + local_trust + city_type, data = df)
r_srh_2 <- lm(SRH ~ fmd + married + edu + income + local_trust*married + city_type, data = df)
summary(r_srh_2)
```
